items.sentence: Someday I hope I can do this as well as you.
I hope both Tom and Mary get what they want.
Tom stretched out on the couch after dinner.
There's still some milk in the refrigerator.
I really need to go home and catch some z's.
I have no choice but to follow those orders.
I had to beg my friends to come to my party.
I need to have a word with you in my office.
I can't believe you'd do such a thing to me.
I just want to be normal like everyone else.
I don't want to pretend I'm someone I'm not.
I don't have many friends outside of school.
I can't remember the last time I had a date.
I can't imagine living a life without books.
I really think you should put some pants on.
I only live here because it's close to work.
I get along quite well now with my new cane.
I prefer soap as a liquid rather than a bar.
I dreamed I was in a very strange situation.
I got you confused with your oldest brother.
I know the president of that club very well.
I think there are lots of sites to see here.
They're going to kick me out of the country.
My father has assured us that that was true.
Tom left without saying anything to anybody.
I think it's time to flip the pancakes over.
Tom left the fridge door open, so I shut it.
Tom was charged with obstruction of justice.
Nobody I know would say something like that.
Tom was involved in a very serious accident.
It looks like you've just had your hair cut.
Differences are what makes life interesting.
Tell me why you've decided to quit your job.
I had no idea that Mary was your girlfriend.
I was handed a note when I entered the gate.
Give Tom this message as soon as he arrives.
I went there for the purpose of meeting Tom.
There's no need for Tom to go there himself.
I think I fell asleep during the last class.
I don't know if I have enough time to do it.
There has to be more to the story than that.
That doesn't leave me with a lot of options.
It's great to see you're having so much fun.
It's actually a lot of easier than it looks.
I'm glad to see you enjoy your work so much.
That's a pretty big fish you've just caught.
I used to go ice fishing when I was younger.
That's exactly what I hoped wouldn't happen.
There's so much I want to say to all of you.
I don't make deals with people I don't like.
